评论详情: Over sized tee just what I wanted
good quality oversized tshirt, i like the way it fits

This shirt is so soft, and the fabric feels like it will last a long time. The colors are exactly as pictured. It holds up well in the washing machine. It’s an oversized shirt and so cute!  It goes well with shorts, jeans, or leggings. There has been no shrinkage at all.
It's a perfect oversized shirt!  I was surprised that it's actually soft

Here’s a funny review for you:  This shirt is super comfy, and being oversized definitely helped survive the summer heat at Hershey Park. The only downside? Apparently, I looked so official that everyone thought I was an employee! At least I was cool and comfy while giving directions!

评论概述: Love it for around the house
评论详情: Funny - I wear this for the gym and just hanging out, and I think people really like this style as I get a weird number of compliments on it!  I think it's the baseball style, which I love, too.  The fabric is a blend, but it doesn't feel like polyester to me.  It' is thicker feeling than that and looks like it has more cotton in it.  It washes and dries nicely and almost wrinkle free.  I ordered an XL, and it fits roomy but not huge.  I'm about 140 lbs, 36 C.

评论概述: Comfortable and perfect for team sports
评论详情: This was perfect for a day of group outdoor activities where we could match and be comfortable. I went a size bigger for a relaxed fit.

I like the cool color detail on the sleeves that make this different from your average white tee. The shape is really comfortable, and the fabric is nice and relaxed; not super stiff like some other shirts I've gotten in the past.

Slightly oversized. I’m 5’2 140lb. I got a medium which is my normal size. Fabric is nice.  It’s soft lightweight and cool but not cheap looking. If you wanting it super oversized go up a size or two.

I'm going to start by saying this shirt is super cute, the print is very vivid and the quality and comfort is awesome. HOWEVER, I was expecting an oversized T-shirt, this is not that. I ordered a large to be oversized and it was fit like a regular large. Definitely need to size up.
Great stretchy fabric! 5 5 160 M was perf
I love this shirt! It’s lightweight, stretchy, and washes nice!
Fit is slightly oversized, comfy and just as pictured. Great lounge/casual tee. I appreciate the quality, fit and product accuracy.
I love oversized tshirts. They’re perfect to just lounge around in

The shirt is exactly as advertised/pictured. It is a soft, comfortable basic tee. The pink is vivid and looks just like the photos. I will wear to lounge around or workout in. I am 5'9, 155 lbs and usually wear size medium. I decided to order a size small because of the measurements provided, and it fits very comfortably and is loose. I could have stuck with my usual size medium for an even more oversized fit.
